commandDescription: display the test results for a given deployment
formatFlagDescription: the format to save create the test results in
deployidFlagDescription: the deployment id to get test results for
outputdirFlagDescription: the directory to store the generated report in
errorFlagRequired: Please specify either the --latest or --deployid flags
errorNoLatestDeploy: The latest deploy could not be found; try again using a deployid: %s
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
